title: (33820) Grado - 23 Calle el Cabo

title: (33820) Grado - 11 Calle de Asturias
description: LAVA VOLAO self-service laundry. 3 washing machines (2x10Kg+1x20Kg). 2 dryers 20Kg . Hours from 09:00 - 22:00

description: Free parking

description: River hike possible, well maintained

title: (33820) Grado - Avenida de los Deportes
description: Free area with 8 large spaces, near the local police and football field. 500 meters from the city center, there are some bars around.

title: (33820) Grado - 9 Calle Maestro Juan Tarrazo
description: Free parking next pools

title: (33829) Grado - 67 Calle Modesto Cuervo Guisasola
description: Free parking

title: (33828) Candamo - 28 AS-312
description: Perfect parking for night

title: (33190) Asturias - Carretera Vnu
description: With parking and picnic

title: (33828) Candamo - 5 AS-236
description: There is a public esplanade and in front of Feve car park, in both you can park, you can visit the cave of Peña de Candamo, you can also eat Asturian homemade food in the Llar de Viri food house, great deal, there is also a pharmacy .

title: (33858) Casas del Puente - AS-15
description: In the countryside, the murmur of the river, the possibility of bathing, ideal for spending a quiet night.

title: (33858) Salas - AS-15
description: Parking rest next to the road with a suspension bridge and a very nice river, a gas station ahead

title: (33857) Salas - 3 N-634
description: Quiet place, with picnic tables. There is a "chiringuito" bar in the same place with a basic bathroom. When I arrived there was a parked van that had passed the night without any problem. The only area that cannot be overnight is the area that is flooded near the river. In the area there is no service but the town is a few minutes away.

title: (33829) Candamo -
description: Recreational area in which we had a perfect night, a couple of more vans but with plenty of space to park. Super nice and green environment with views and routes perfect for families. On Sunday at about midnight, there was plenty of people in the plan, but nothing bothersome and as we say, it has a lot of space. There's no water.

title: (33828) Candamo - 60 AS-39
description: Very quiet place next to a church and cemetery with beautiful views of the valley. Silent.

title: (33119) Priañes -
description: Parking area if the gazebo parking is full.

title: (33191) Rañeces - Unnamed Road
description: Parking to visit the Meandros del Nora viewpoints. You can spend the night since there is no signage that prohibits it.

name: Finca Zihuatanejo
title: (33191) Finca Zihuatanejo
description: Beautiful Zihuatanejo Garden with huge trees and grass meadow. Only Cars Vans or small motorhome maximum 6 meters. It is flat and horizontal well leveled. Large wooden picnic table Perfect for a day out or getaway. Near the viewpoint of the Meandros del Nora. And spectacular area on the outskirts of Oviedo. 10 minutes from Oviedo and 40 from Gijon. Private Estate of a Campervan. If you leave it as you find it, I'll let you spend the night on my farm. Let me know by Whatsapp and I'll tell you how to pass.

title: (33119) Oviedo - 3 Caserio la Barquera
description: Small siding next to the road where you can eat in the shade and with a fountain

title: (33119) Trubia -
description: Self-service laundry. Open daily from 9am to 10pm. 2 machines of 12 kg each for 6€. 1 machine at 19 kg for 9€. 2 large dryers for 4€ each for 12 minutes. Opening hours: 08:00 - 22:00.

title: (33129) -
description: Recreational area for fortnights, with tables, nearby there is a bar and bathing area in the river

title: (33129) Forcinas -
description: A place to spend the night if you are on the way. It has no services but it is very quiet. It is a little-traveled street at night as it is only used by the locals. Ideal one or two campers.

title: (33119) Asturias - 278 Lugar San Andres
description: Spring water, old drinking trough. Water quality is not guaranteed. However, it tastes good. Also saw locals taking water twice. Access and exit is good. Also possible with a large mobile. Faucet has no thread. The pipe is thick, so it is better to use a kettle or watering can to remove it. Weak water flow.

title: (33190) La Reigada - Unnamed Road
description: Parking near the windmills on the mountain, quiet, with a beautiful view

title: (33120) Pravia - 1 Calle Santa Eulalia
description: Old laundry room with drinking water fountain, the locals say it is one of the best in the place and it comes out fresh! There is a small trash can too.

title: (33120) Pravia - 7 Calle Martínez de Tena
description: Small municipal car park at the top of the city center. Several mobile homes are parked there. Quiet and silent.

title: (33127) - 32A Lugar la Carretera
description: Parking in the restaurant, the night went well. It is a good place to visit the surroundings, the restaurant offers a daily menu and grills

title: (33115) - AS-228
description: Parking to walk the path of the Bear. Mtb center of excellence. They have a website where you can get the tracks of the routes. Very cool and cañeras

title: (33140) Oviedo - 2 Lugar las Caldas
description: Parking next to the municipal swimming pool of Las Caldas, the access is quite steep, be careful with the motorhomes, it is right next to the Fuso greenway, about 10 km of asphalt road in a beautiful environment, which takes you to the park winter of Oviedo. No services.

title: (33174) Las Caldas - 60 Lugar las Caldas
description: Public parking behind the spa

title: (33114) Linares - Unnamed Road
description:
This location on top of the mountain is truly beautiful. If you climb up the hill next to the parking, you have a 360 degree view here.
At 900 meters there is a culinary restaurant La Cuadrina. (For when you want to spoil yourself.)
The road to it (coming from the AS-228) is very beautiful and of good quality, but narrow, winding and steeply uphill. So you really have to work to get there. But the reward is fantastic.
(We came up with a bus camper of 2.10x6.50 and 150hp without any problems.)
Locals passing by are very friendly.
It is a wonderful starting point for walkers and cyclists. Very quiet.

NB! There is no service here. Not even trash cans. This location is very clean, please keep it clean as well. The location is worth it!

title: (33115) - AS-360
description: Hiking trail, highly recommended route "Gorges" with spectacular views.

name: Area Recreativa Las Xanas
title: (33115) Area Recreativa Las Xanas
description: Recreational area parking to do the Xanas route.

title: (33115) Villanueva - 9 Barrio el Puente
description:
Nice fresh water fountain.
If you pass through here and you are hot, this fountain comes out of a very good cool water

title: (33194) Ajuyán - LL-6
description: Recreational area to make the route to the covarones, caves in a small nearby river, very quiet area, ample and flat parking.

title: (33458) La Corrada - 42 Calle de San Lorenzo
title_short: (33458) La Corrada - 42 Calle de San Lorenzo
description: Leisure area with plenty of parking spaces, very quiet place surrounded by nature

name: Granja Santa Ana
title: (33129) Granja Santa Ana
description: Free van and small caravan site in a meadow with a view of the mountains. Height limit 3,35m. Peace and nature. 10 minutes from Aguilar beach. Farm of dairy sheep, hens, geese and ducks. Visits to the farm possible, ecological garden. Please message us before!

title: (33194) Ules - 12 Lugar Ules
description:
Ules recreational area. There are picnic tables, a drinking fountain and garbage cans.
Just 4 flat parking spaces and not too big, and next to the street, but the place is very calm and has very little passage of cars and people at night.

title: (33115) - AS-228
description: In front of a bar that make spectacular burgers, and next to the river, highly recommended place to visit.

title: (33860) Salas - Av. del Llaniello
description: The population is SALAS. We have spent one night there. It is a car park near the school, at night there is no one because all the cars have left, they only come to bring their children to school, it is a very quiet place five minutes from the town center.

title: (33869) Salas - 10 Avenida del Llaniello
description:
Free area with 8 seats, located next to the school area and 900m from the center.
It has an area for emptying gray and black water, and filling with drinking water.
They plan to open on 8/25/23, although it can already be used.
At the moment it does not have light points.

title: (33193) Oviedo - 1T Lugar Piedramuelle
description: Parking in sports facilities. There is a bar in the parking lot. There are no signs prohibiting overnight and there is parking space for buses. There is another parking lot above.

title: (33139) Pravia - Unnamed Road
description: Monteagudo recreational area parking. An area to eat, spend the day with truly spectacular views. From the viewpoint there are incredible views of the mouth of the Nalón River (the largest and most important river in Asturias), seeing San Juan de la Arena, San Esteban de Pravia ... The parking lot is flat and with well-established land, they enter about 5-6 vans, no more. Access for AC and wide vehicles is narrow (not very advisable ...). The area has benches and tables to eat and spend the day. It is a very quiet place and surrounded by a beautiful forest. Really advisable.

title: (33860) Salas - 8 Urbanización la Pomarada
description: Right in front of the municipal hostel and close to the center, just to park and spend the night. quiet site

title: (33126) Soto del Barco - 88 Calle Llago
description: Small parking next to the restaurant the inn in there, where you eat a fable, quiet night, without supplies and away from the village

title: (33114) Proaza - BAJO AS-228
description: At the Proaza Gas Station they have an LPG pump in addition to the usual services.

title: (33845) - AS-227
description: Recreational area with a dozen tables and barbecues, sun and shade spaces between trees. next  to the road arriving at Belmonte and in the direction of Somiedo. No services except bins

title: (33114) Proaza - 1 Calle el Torreón
description: Parking in Proaza in the village, supermarket and a pharmacy next door.  Very calm. Fresh water, black and grey water disposal and plenty of space for at least 10 vans.

title: (33129) Pravia - Unnamed Road
description: La Peñona recreation area, wide with tables and barbecues, quiet and good views from the viewpoint.

title: (33114) Proaza - 14 Calle el Torreón
description: Motorhome area with 10 spacious and well-defined spaces, with filling and emptying, garbage and recycling services. Nearby there is a covered sports court and children's games. It is next to the fire station and very close to the town with bars and shops.

title: (33126) Soto del Barco - N-632
description: Area to rest and bathe at the riverbank. Fishermen's zone

title: (33171) Bueño - Unnamed Road
description: Nice and very quiet town, small but sufficient parking.

title: (33013) Oviedo - 35 Calle Ricardo Vazquez Prada
description: Parking of the municipal soccer stadium "Carlos Tartiere". Without services, very spacious and quiet. Nearby a Mercadona supermarket. Thirty minutes from downtown on foot, or five minutes by car.

title: (33194) Oviedo - 6D Avenida de los Monumentos
description: Parking to visit the pre-Romanesque monuments of Santa María del Naranco

title: (33172) Soto de Ribera - MO-5
description: Very nice on a lake, 3 to 4 vehicles fit in the parking lot. Very spacious picnic area with sitting areas. However, it's not as isolated as it looks in the pictures. Right next to the street and houses all around.

title: (33194) Oviedo - 6 Lugar el Pevidal
description: About Oviedo at the Christ the Redeemer Statue. Aussblick in the mountains and on the Atlantic Ocean. Fantastic location. No service.

title: (33830) Belmonte - 11 Avenida Carretera del Puerto
description: Plain park next to sports facilities

title: (33869) Soto de los Infantes - 46 Lugar Soto de los Infantes
title_short: (33869) Soto de los Infantes - 46 Lugar Soto de los Infantes
description: Recreational area, with barbecues, picnic area, garbage containers and water source, on the river bank, very quiet.

title: (33006) Oviedo - 11 Avenida Julián Clavería
description: Free parking at 25min walk from city centre. No services. There is a gate at the entrance but local said it doesn’t close at any time. Not spent the night here. Dog park and kids playground right next to it.

title: (33171) Soto de Ribera -
description: Large parking with a recreation area, barbecue, free

title: (33170) Soto de Ribera - 21A Calle el Lugar Caleyo
title_short: (33170) Soto de Ribera - 21A Calle el Lugar Caleyo
description: Small rest area easily accessible, with gazebo included. Tables and informational signs on nearby trails. It is a very quiet and somewhat lonely, almost inhospitable place (despite being 5m from the road) where to spend the night without big noises and enjoy a clean air. Parking without slope. There is no fountain or water point. If there are bins. 4G coverage.

title: (33830) Belmonte - 3A Avenida Río Pigüeña
description: Parking next to the municipal pool and with bars and shops around. This is a parking area for residents of the apartments. Didn't realise until we arrived. However, there were many empty spaces and (in October) we weren't asked to move. The river is right next to it, and you can sleep without problems. Nearby you will find bars, cafés and restaurants and the beginning of several hiking trails.

title: (33006) Oviedo - 8 Plaza Teodoro López Cuesta
description: Good place to park and visit the city. It is located in the old central university hospital of Asturias, 10 minutes' walk from the center. There are no signs of prohibited ac or vans. At night there is a security guard. Going unnoticed there should be no problem to spend the night since there is only one building in front.

title: (33006) Oviedo - 14 Calle Langreo
description: Public parking enabled for parking, without prohibition of staying overnight, in a residential area Montecerrao, a very quiet area without traffic, ideal to spend a few nights, without services, near the Tuero Bertrand park to be able to walk and stretch your legs. There are some trails in the area.

title: (33458) Soto del Barco - AS-318
description: Parking for all types of vehicles next to a road. At night hardly a car passes with which you can rest. At the exit of the parking lot there is a fountain.

title: (33012) Oviedo - 96 Menéndez Pelayo
description: Street parking in quiet place next to Enjoy-fitness!

title: (33006) Oviedo - 54 Calle San Martin del Rey Aurelio
title_short: (33006) Oviedo - 54 Calle San Martin del Rey Aurelio
description: Quiet place in Montecerrado.

address.street: 54 Calle San Martin del Rey Aurelio

title: (33459) La Lloba - N-632
description: BP gas station with water tap for refilling. Inclined, but easy to fill, tap with key and thread for hose connection. ONLY recharges, does not download.

title: (33194) Oviedo - Avenida de los Monumentos
description: At the top of a very steep and windy road. There is a 360° curve that is very difficult to take, with any vehicle, especially with a motorhome, car with a trailer or caravan. A short distance from Christ the Redeemer (better known as "El Cristo del Naranco").

title: (33004) Oviedo - 27 Calle de la Independencia
description: Laundry in the center of Oviedo

title: (33170) Oviedo - calle laviana
description: Small quiet area where you can park, near the Tuero Bertrand park, being a purely residential area there is hardly any traffic or influx of people, only some residents who go out to the park for a walk, it is an area to disconnect, we have parked in the area and no problem. Dogs are allowed in the park.

title: (33470) Monteagudo - LL-2
description: Recreational area of monteagudo. Equipped with tables and containers. Very good views of the surroundings.

title: (33130) Muros de Nalón - Junquera
description: Large square next to the estuary, 400 m from St. Stephen, important people in the past for its port, from there came the Asturian coal to foundries like Altos Hornos de Vizcaya. Important industrial heritage and an ideal place to relax. There is no problem in the night.

title: (33005) Oviedo - 1 Calle Aniceto Sela
description: Public street side parking in the university area, quiet at night and safe. practically level ground. silent at night and also during the day on a secondary road with little traffic. a 10-minute walk from the center, near a large central park. perfect for a one or two night stopover. paid parking, except on Sundays

title: (33011) Oviedo - 10H Calle Juan Valera
description: Parking area in Tierra esplanade next to the ibis hotel. Large, close to bars and polygon. About 2 km from the center.

title: (33130) Muros de Nalón - 2 Calle Casto Plasencia
title_short: (33130) Muros de Nalón - 2 Calle Casto Plasencia
description: Parking for day and night without problem, in the town with all services and a train station next to it to go to aviles, oviedo and gijon. The parking lots are great.

title: (33114) Proaza - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful view of the valley and the mountains, on the road that leads to Bandujo.

title: (33011) Oviedo - 43 Avenida de Pando
description: Very quiet car park on the outskirts of Oviedo, the spaces are a bit on a slope, it is about 15 minutes from the center on foot, we spent the night very quietly, without noise. For an AC the places are somewhat short.

title: (33130) Muros de Nalón - 8 Paseo Marítimo Marq Santulla
title_short: (33130) Muros de Nalón - 8 Paseo Marítimo Marq Santulla
description:
We spent the day on this car park for our part facing the surf school so that the ground was straight.
harbor view. Noise from boat engines.
the restaurants around are top with a very friendly welcome

title: (33424) Posada - 21 Avenida Prudencio González
description: Eco Laundry "EcoLaundry" There is a 20kg washing machine, two 10kg washers and two 20kg dryers.

title: (33161) Vega de Bobies - Unnamed Road
description: Small car park in Vega de Bobies with breathtaking views of the central region of Asturias and the Sierra del Aramo. The last 5 kilometers of the climb are very similar to a very narrow asphalt track. The climb is only recommended for motorhomes less than 6 meters. But, at the end of the road, the reward is the view and the tranquility we breathe

title: (33008) Oviedo - 203 Calle Gil Blas
description: Free parking next to the pools, quiet and level site, with large green areas. 20 minutes walk from the cathedral.

title: (33456) Avilés - AS-237
description: Cepsa service statio  - Free water opposite gas station. There’s also a carrefour express, cafe and a hand car wash

title: (33138) Muros de Nalón - AS-317
description: Large parking next to the wonderful beach of Playa de Aguilera. Pick-nick benches and BBQ facilities. There is a no camping sign. We were there for one night and didn't see anyone.

title: (33125) San Juan de la Arena -
description: Parking in San Juan de la Arena. Good views of the estuary at the end of the Nalón. There is a paved parking lot that can fit about 15 motorhomes. The town is right next door. There are no services except garbage containers.

title: (33009) Oviedo - Calle Arzobispo Guisasola
description: Paid parking on the street for max 2h. Except on Saturday afternoons and Sundays when it’s free with no time limit. The closest parking to the old town. No height limit and good length. We managed to park our L3H3 van by going a little on the sidewalk. A bit noisy on a Saturday night

title: (33138) Muros de Nalón - Unnamed Road
description: Only 4 or 5 vehicles, narrow access, beautiful promenade overlooking the sea, access to the beach, hiking trail after steep.

title: (33009) Oviedo - 22 Calle Arzobispo Guisasola
description: Convenient parking for visiting the historic center of Oviedo (about 5 minutes on foot). Two hours of parking max renewable by paying via app (free on Sundays and public holidays). On the other hand, the car park is on the cob and suitable for vehicles up to 6m long.

title: (33125) San Juan de la Arena - Unnamed Road
title_short: (33125) San Juan de la Arena - Unnamed Road
description: Incredible place the parking is on grass next to the river in a small and charming town there are no services but you can park very wide

title: (33138) Reborio - Unnamed road
description: We spend the night in the parking lot. We were driving a citroen t60 and it was the only place that didn't bother us since it's very long and the parking lot next door fills up with 4 ACs. Very quiet place on the beach. In the morning more cars arrived and there was a little more noise.

title: (33008) Oviedo - 14 Lugar la Bolgachina
description: Public next to the parking lot in winter. Without any service, but you can park to see the city and spend the night. 15 minutes walk from the cathedral

title: (33159) Cudillero - San Juan de Piñera
description: Playground next to a hotel and large parking lot (swings, cable car, trampoline and other play equipment), very worthwhile for a lunch stop so the children can let off steam

name: Camping Cudillero - Asturias
title: (33150) Camping Cudillero - Asturias
description: Beautifully laid out family campsite with large pitches just outside of Cudillero. Very idyllic with lots of trees, palm trees and blue hydrangeas. Clean sanitary facilities, small restaurant and supermarket, bread service. Beautifully landscaped pool area with palm trees and loungers. Online reservation possible.

title: () Cudillero - AS-317
description: Magnificent parking on the edge of Aguilar beach. Perfect to spend the night with the sound of the sea. In summer and during the day it must be crazy. Close a bar

title: (33011) Oviedo - 42 Calle Aureliano San Román
description: Laundry room with dryer.

title: (33154) Cudillero - AS-317
description: Quiet site, we did not see any prohibition, we visited in Nov. 2017. Good views, no service

title: (33839) Ondes -
description: It is forbidden to leave residues of any kind. No toilet paper please. It is an impeccable and clean meadow on a hill. 4km uphill to get there from Belmonte. Absolutely quiet, bucolic and pastoral. No service or water. Just peace.

title: (33826) - 152A Lugar Villabre
description: On the side of a road where no one ever seems to pass by except for Calvin the cow and his mates. Absolute tranquility. Beautiful view. No houses in sight. Perfect when on the road, but no water, bins, tables or whatever. Enjoy!

title: (33125) Soto del Barco - Calle de la Galerna
title_short: (33125) Soto del Barco - Calle de la Galerna
description: Parking next to the Nalón River. The angula weekend is reserved for caravans. He is in the city. 50 meters from the first restaurants

title: (33008) Oviedo - 6B Calle Julián Cañedo
description: Great laundromat. Honest prices.

title: (33011) Oviedo - 56 Avenida del Mar
description: Laundromat laundry

title: (33125) San Juan de la Arena - 60 Avenida los Quebrantos
title_short: (33125) San Juan de la Arena - 60 Avenida los Quebrantos
description: Self-service laundry with detergent and fabric softener included in the wash. Close to Quebrantos beach.

title: (33011) Oviedo - 202B Lugar Ponton de Vaqueros
description: Big parking spot, close to Lidl and Repsol.

title: (33008) Oviedo - 6B Calle Otero
description: Parking spaces near the city and that fits a camper van well, small incline but it sleeps well

title: (33125) San Juan de la Arena -
description: Gravel parking on the water's edge. Two picnic tables. Next to a sports field. Less than 10 minutes from Garruncho y La Guardada beach and close to the Mirador del Espíritu Santo.

title: (33010) Oviedo - 12 Calle Darío de Regoyos
description: Laundromat in a quiet neighborhood. Opposite there is a delicious bakery.

title: (33130) Muros de Nalón - MU-2
description: Picnic area at the Mirador del Espiritu Santo (San Esteban) with beautiful view.

title: (33459) Soto del Barco - Unnamed Road
description: Free parking next to the small cemetery of Ranón. If you are traveling with pets, it is a good place to leave the van and go down to Sablon beach, since in high season the main roads usually close. A leafy path takes you downhill to the beach in 20min. Despite Google saying that you can get to the beach directly with the van ... It is not possible. In the overnight area there are several parking spaces, a container and a source of drinking water. Absolute silence and the police do not pass if we respect the environment.

title: (33125) San Juan de la Arena - Av. los Quebrantos, s/n
title_short: (33125) San Juan de la Arena - Av. los Quebrantos, s/n
description: Parking at the beach, allowed to campers at night. Picnic tables.

title: (33130) Muros de Nalón - Paseo Marítimo Marq Santulla
title_short: (33130) Muros de Nalón - Paseo Marítimo Marq Santulla
description: Large parking with access to the beach, toilets, beach service shower. Pool with sea water and bar.

name: Camping L'Amuravela
title: (33154) Camping L'Amuravela
description: Quiet, family campsite with spacious, shaded pitches. Located 1km from the old town of Cudillero. Gray water drainage point and chemical toilet, as well as water refill.

title: (33011) Oviedo - Calle Arancedo
description: Parking at the side of the parking lot of Los Prados shopping center

title: () Cudillero -
description: Quiet and flat place depending on the height of the street which is parked...about 15 minutes from the city downhill then you have to climb steep slopes...we went to see the city in the other area next to the port

title: (33159) Cudillero - 10A Calle Agustín Bravo
description:
Perfect parking to see Cudillero with the possibility to spend the night, near the center
with a water spring, I don't know if it's drinkable, behind the public school.

title: (33150) Cudillero -
description: Good place to rest and visit the town. We have spent three nights. Fairly quiet. There are no noises and hardly any cars pass by. It is not the exact point that the app marked. It's next door. To go to the town you have to go down a path that you then have to climb of course. Spectacular town. Good views, good restaurants (we dined at La Paloma, El Remo and Casa Julio, all three recommended). We did running and hiking routes. A nice place to visit and of the three car parks available I think this is the best.

title: (33008) Oviedo - 3 Calle Salvador Fuente Gonzalez
description: Parking in front of buildings.We parked with a Renault master 5.90m,no issue.1.6 km walk to the city.Many space.We stay only for the day but possible may be overnight,no sign anyway.

title: (33010) Oviedo - 13 Calle Río Pigüeña
description: Dead end parallel to the road to Atenas, near Palacio desportes, 1,5km from the old town we stayed for the day

title: (33011) Oviedo - 258 Calle Daniel Moyano
description:
Parking area with 16 slots for the different lengths of motorhome with two areas for services. Maximum time of 72 hours.
Close to bus lines to visit the city. Take the number 2 bus to the city and the number 1 to come back. The old town and cathedral area are worth a look but it's a 45/50 minute walk and little of interest to see along the way. Supermarket 200 metres.

title: (33159) Cudillero - N-632
description: Gas station with motorhome services. Free if you refuel.

title: (33162) Santa Eulalia-Morcín - 9 Calle Pumarín
description: Service area and parking reserved for 4 or 5 motorhomes next to a recreational area. There is also a parking with more seats. The village is about 200 meters across the recreational area

title: (33011) Oviedo - 26 Calle Daniel Moyano
description: Self-service laundromat 50 m from the car park. 3 dryers. Washing machines.

title: (33159) - 177A Calle Villademar
description: A masymas supermarket with a good free service area for motorhomes. It has 2 reserved spaces for AC and also contains a laundry.  It is only a service area for emptying and filling during the supermarket opening hours which are currently 09:00 to 21:00 Mondays to Saturday. Closed all day on Sundays. The area is closed with large steel gates outside of shopping hours and overnight sleeping is not allowed.

name: Área recreativa Santofirme
title: (33690) Área recreativa Santofirme
description: Santo Firme Recreation Area. area with tables and benches, fountain and great views. The road is narrow but not crowded.

title: (33470) La Calabaza -
description: Large grassy esplanade next to a pretty little chapel. We spent the night there. Right very quiet with the added bonus of a beautiful view. We met only one person there who had come to feed the horses. No service (no water, no trash, no toilet). Thank you for respecting this beautiful place and for leaving no waste please

title: (33879) Tineo - AS-15
description: RECREATIONAL AREA OF CASA L´PUERTO Location: Located in the Alto de la Casa de Puerto (1025 meters of altitude) from where you can see a part of the council of Tineo. Data: Security zone, panoramic point, fountain, access to road traffic, parking area, barbecue, tables and accessible coaches. VISITABLE RESOURCES: - Panoramic point.

title: (33403) Avilés - 7 Calle Francisco Pizarro
description: Large parking area, lots of room, I was 1 of 10 camper vans / motorhomes parked here. A little noisy with passing traffic & youths but stopped by 10pm.  Small field behind to walk your dogs.

title: (33160) Grandiella - 12 RI-2
description: Viapara area. Area with tables and barbecues. At the start of the hardest part of the ascent to the Angliru you will see the cyclists pale before what awaits them. It is not easy to park flat, 200 m before there is an esplanade.

title: (33150) Cudillero - 4-5 Plaza Marina
description: This is a large parking area overlooking the harbour where I stayed alongside many other vans/motorhomes. Motorhomes are not allowed overnight. No services just beautiful views

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Surrounded by nature, site for a motorhome or a couple of vans. The road is narrow with some slope but accessible. Several nearby hiking trails.

title: (33457) Bayas - Aldea Navalon, 17
description: Bayas beach ATTENTION. The City Council of Castrillón has prohibited overnight stays. They distribute information sheets in the afternoon and report in the morning to the registrations reported the day before.

title: (33450) Piedras Blancas - 19 Calle Rey Pelayo
description: Automatic laundry with two 10kg and two 20kg washing machines and 2 dryers. at 100 meters large parking for all types of vehicles.

title: (33159) Cudillero - CU-3
description: Viewpoint with sea views and a small parking area next to the entrance road to Cudillero, very little occupied. There is some traffic but as of midnight hardly any cars pass, quite quiet place. Without any services. (Pending uploading photos)

name: Camping Yolimar
title: (33155) Camping Yolimar
description: Camping near Cudillero and right next to Las Conchas beach. It is basically a small campsite with fixed caravans and another 10-15 free pitches. The facilities are old (only two hot water showers €1/6min). Grass pitches and dirt roads.

title: (33159) Cudillero - Camino las Dueñas
description: Caravan/camper site with services at Hotel Restaurant House Fernando II

title: (33403) Avilés - 46 Calle Hermanos Pinzón
description:
Simple, large, lighted, free car park in Avilés.
Supermarket and Gas station within walking distance
to reach. Good for an overnight stay.

name: Camping los Pradones
title: (33155) Camping los Pradones
description: Camping los pradones

title: (33159) Cudillero - CU-3
description: At the entrance, directly on the sea. According to police allowed overnight stay, but no camping (tables, chairs, Marquiese, supports).

name: Camping las Gaviotas Asturias
title: (33457) Camping las Gaviotas Asturias
description: Camping Las Gravitos, with motorhome area

title: (33420) Lugones - 30A Avenida Conde Santa Bárbara
description: Free area. Bus station nearby near the RENFE station. Take bus N 2 to visit Oviedo. Black and grey water station!

title: (33192) Llanera - 61A Calle Peña Mayor
description: Annex to the Silvota Hotel. Attached to a garden area, with shade. If you are going to work in the Polygon, or you need to spend the night in the area, it is very quiet.

title: (33155) Cudillero - 1 La Magdalena
description: Parking with spectacular views of the beautiful beach of La Concha de Artedo (Cudillero). It is dirt and slightly sloping.

title: (33690) Lugo de Llanera - 5 Calle Naranjo de Bulnes
title_short: (33690) Lugo de Llanera - 5 Calle Naranjo de Bulnes
description: Public laundry, hours from 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m., large washing machines to wash blankets, sheets, and of course… clothes.

title: (33420) Siero - Calle Peña Santa
description: Repsol gas station with showers does not open on sunday afternoon

title: (33420) Lugones - 2 Calle Rio Cares
description: Laundry with several machines and dryers. Good facility and bars to have a coffee while waiting for the wash. About 150 meters from the Motorhome area.

title: (33155) Cudillero - 26 Caserio la Magdalena
description: Excellent places to spend 1 or 2 days just 2 steps from the beach. Beach of beautiful stones and turquoise but cold water. It is actually a recreational area, with a very level parking area for motorhomes. Attention to the access guided by GPS, it can send you to Cudillero and leave you bogged down!!! he is not the first who has had to call the tow truck, look for access on the national highway.

title: (33457) Bayas - 9 Aldea la Roza
description: Small car park next to a cemetery. Magnificent view.

title: (33690) Lugo de Llanera - 13 Calle S
description: Very good place to bivouac. Very quiet. With playground for children and adults. Next to the station to go to Oviedo. 5 minutes from the Lugones area for services

title: (33429) Paredes -
description: Parking in Parque Principado (mall), great for shopping at nearby stores, wifi and toilets available at Ikea and other stores. We never had any problems or felt unsafe.

title: (33457) Naveces - 5 Calle Bellamar
description: Parking at the edge of the beach with buildings nearby.

title: (33118) - 35A Parque Agueras
description: It is the private parking of the only bar in the town of Aciera, but they let you stay the night asking permission at the bar and consuming. Access is by a narrow road, for vans and small ACs. Ideal for climbing the climbing area of Quirós or doing routes in the surroundings.

name: Camping Bahinas
title: (33457) Camping Bahinas
description: , 15 Camino Bahínas. Camping Bahinas

title: (33457) Asturias - CT-6
description: Good to spend a night in a camper van. The road is quite small and narrow. Off season no issue to spend a night, no services and also doesn’t have cell coverage. The beach is very nice

title: (33401) Avilés - 42 Calle Juan XXIII
description: Avilés Sports Complex, ideal for taking a hot shower. By paying the entrance to the gym or the swimming pool  you can use the facilities and take the opportunity to go to the bathroom and shower with hot water. They are not the best showers but they get you out of trouble

title: (33402) Avilés - 52 Calle Gutiérrez Herrero
description: Paved parking with enough spaces without specification that the AC cannot park and spend the night, we have done it without problem, it is at the entrance of 632 and there may be some traffic noise but bearable, next to a supermarket, transport public, 15 minutes from the city center and the Niemeyer center.

title: (33401) Avilés - 24 Calle Fuero de Avilés
description: Parking Quirinal sports center, after talking to the police because we parked here several times as there were always motorhomes: they told us that parking was not punished, except at night. We use it to be as close as possible to the center, then we go elsewhere in the area to spend the night.

title: (33118) - 12 AS-229
description: Parking with picnic area. You can spend the night, maximum 48 hours. Do not remove tables or canopy. Free. Next to a lake. Ideal to go with children and dogs. Climbing area nearby.

title: (33404) Asturias - 1 Calle el Castaño
description: Self-service laundry with 3 washing machines of 12kg, 15kg, 20kg and 3 dryers of 20kg.Ample parking around. Mercadona supermarket opposite.

title: (33403) Avilés - 7 Calle Santa Cecilia
description:
Parking in a neighborhood of Avilés.
It is on a slope, the higher up the street the less slope. The good thing is that it is next to a park with good grass, many spray cans, benches, a fountain and some garbage cans on the perpendicular street. little traffic during the day, I suppose less at night. Close to bars and cider houses

title: (33400) Avilés - 21 Calle Pico Urriellu
description:
Parking in urban area. A little narrow for large motorhomes. Better for vans.
Flat gravel floor. No road noise.
Excellent cafe-bar with sandwiches and a large television screen to watch sports, for example. Supermarket and other services next door.

title: (33457) - 11 Aldea la Roza
description: Small car park with fountain, bin and excellent sea views. Beautiful walk on the edge of the sea.

title: (33457) - 11 Aldea la Roza
description: A secluded place for 2 vans to enjoy the night with a beautiful view. Very quiet area right on the cliff at the end of a small path but easy to get to.

title: (33416) Asturias - 4 AS-17
description: Quiet and with good views

title: (33401) Avilés - 21 Calle José Cueto
description: Online parking, in a blue zone, very convenient to visit the center. Several squares,

title: () Corvera de Asturias -
description: Fuente de agua natural de manantial de toda la vida.

title: (33457) Asturias - 11 Aldea la Roza
description: Parking for 4-5 vehicles. Road access, well paved. We stay without problem. It has a fountain and a wastebasket. A very beautiful path with viewpoints passes through it. Perfect.

title: (33400) Los Campos - 108 Los Campos
description: Parking that although it is true that it is attached to the road and a train track, to spend the night it is fine, we slept without problem. As an alternative to when the area near the lake is complete, as was the case in our case, it is very good. Large adjoining green area, some sports facilities such as a basketball court / "indoor football" and a ping pong table. It can be said that it is practically level, the inclination is negligible.

title: (33669) Olloniego - 2D Caserio San Pelayo
description: It is a Recreation Area at the entrance of the Town, we asked the neighbors and they told us that there was no problem sleeping there as long as we did not park inside the Area (it is delimited). We spent two amazing nights in the shade and practically alone. The neighbors told us routes to do, places to see and drinking water sources in the surroundings, without a doubt a fantastic place to disconnect :)

title: (33199) Paredes - 101A Lugar Paredes
description:
Big parking spot between nature and a big mall. Close to Ikea, Bricomart, Burger King & more. 
Despite it's position close to these big buildings, there is only little traffic on the street that leads up to the parking spot.
It's rather empty and devoid of passengers, maybe it serves as a parking spot for employees.
The noises from the big streets are everpresent, yet in a muted way.
The spot is surrounded by a firm on one side and nature, grass, cows on all other 3 sides.
Perfect if you want to visit the surrounding shops AND relax a little while.

title: (33460) Avilés - 7 Calle Acero
description: New motorhome area, 5 places and more than 200 parking spaces. Lots of back and forth. About 8-10 minutes from the city hall, where there are many entertainment and shopping areas, the city presents a lot of things to visit.

title: (33450) Arnao - 62 La Fábrica
description:
Perfect car park to visit the Arnao mine museum, which I highly recommend. You have to book before coming, you have all the information on the museum's website.
Parking is exclusively during the day and at the entrance it is clearly indicated that camping is prohibited.

title: (33405) Salinas - 2 Calle el Agüil
description: Drain the black water and fill the clean water. 48 hours maximum. no recomiendo sleep, mucho mucho tráfico.lugar para cargar u descargar aguas.no sleep

title: (33402) Avilés - 20 Calle del Muelle
description: Train station parking. Close to the center. It is dirt with some loose stones.

title: (33460) Avilés - 70 Avenida de Gijón
description: Repsol Gas station with LPG, near the motorhome city parking spot

title: (33459) Fondon -
description: Quiet, flat area, between trees, and clear areas where the sun shines, capacity for several vans/motorhomes. A short walk from the Pinos Altos Recreation Area where there are picnic tables, swings, containers and a panoramic view of Salinas Beach.

title: (33405) Salinas - 2 Calle Doctor Carreño
description: Happy Laundry with 1 washing machine of 20 kg, 2 of 10 kg, 3 dryers of 20 kg. All right.

title: (33161) Lugar de Abajo - 16 Carretera General
description: We spend the night and use the car park to leave the motorhome and ride the Angliru by bicycle. We ask in the town and without problems. There are toilets in the sports bar

title: (33118) Cortina - 39 AS-229
description: Parking next to a recreation area with tables and swings. Magnificent view of the mountains. Although the road is close, there is very little traffic. Ideal to spend the day and eat supertranquilos.

title: (33429) - 925A Lugar la Fresneda
description: Laundry at the GALP gas station. The tokens are bought at the same gas station. Washers and dryers of different sizes. Gas station with services for caravans, car wash for pets, wash for motorhomes, Burger King, shopping centers. If you refuel, the water change is free, otherwise it costs 3 euros.

title: (33155) Lamuño - 2 CU-6
description: Equipped picnic area, two small parking lots in the grove for max 6 vans, two tables near the grill where we cooked excellent pizzas. We are very Italian. Horses along the way. Recommended for one night!

title: (33490) Avilés - 7 Avenida Conde de Guadalhorce
description: Free parking next to the Niemeyer center, next to a commercial port. Spaces for campers and AC not very long. Quiet place although I do not think that it is optimal to spend the night because the maintenance engines of the Niemeyer center can be heard at times. The parking is 15 minutes walk from the center

title: (33470) - 26 LL-9
description: Car park next to a community centre and park. good amount of spaces and when we were there only people parked. can spend the night no problem

title: (33161) Lugar de Arriba - 9 Calle la Huertica
title_short: (33161) Lugar de Arriba - 9 Calle la Huertica
description: Free motorhome parking, very quiet area. Ideal to start a road bike ride to Angliru.

title: (33690) - Autovía Ruta de la Plata
description: Motorway service area with several non-official services but very friendly staff. If you ask, they make you fill your drinking water and empty the gray water in the drain for the washing of the truck tanks. Clean bathrooms.

title: (33155) Cudillero - 10 CU-6
description: Large recreation area with tables and grills. There is a fountain and good parking. Access to Oleiros beach (nudist).

title: (33405) Salinas - 3 Avenida Juan Sitges
description: Parking on the beach of Salinas. A flat platform to put your vehicle. Right next to the road. Out of season it is certainly possible to stay overnight.

title: (33690) Castiello - A-66
description:
There is a free drinking water point at the Repsol gas station.
There is no gray or black water area. There is also a small MASYMAS supermarket.

title: (33422) - 145 Lugar Castiello
description: Repsol gas station with parking for trucks. It has Café Store with shower for a fee, the cafeteria has a couple of tables outside that we appreciate those who travel with dogs.

title: (33404) - Calle Avilés
description: Rest area next to a marsh. Tables and barbecue. The reservoir of Trasona next to which you can swim, fish and practice water sports.

title: (33155) Salamir - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking area in the middle of nature. There is a path to the beach 50mts away. Spent the night with a campervan. It was crowded during the day, full of cars . Nobody at night. It was off season

title: (33404) Overo -
description: The area is next to the Los Balagares spillway and has an area of six hundred square meters. It is accessed from the Overo roundabout and includes a service platform or terminal, where water intakes and a space for the discharge of wastewater are made available to users.

title: (33401) Avilés - 59 Avenida Conde de Guadalhorce
description: Parkinglot with view at the harbor. Alot of fisherman at night.

title: (33405) Salinas - 11 Calle Pablo Laloux
description: A large part of the site, in front of the beach, we spent the day and all great, garden for dogs, if there is no place in 100m before there are 2 esplanadas grandisimas (a sloping pelin) but with a lot of place, quiet area, but time people and bars and very recommended, the beach a passage of large and beautiful

title: (33405) Salinas - 14 Calle Pablo Laloux
description: Very large space to spend the day, night prohibited. We were previously in the parking lot of the Aviles caravans and it is impossible to have a good time between the narrowness of the waxes and the movement generated by the passage of the winged cars; we decided to go to this place near the very calm beach and the big space.
